title_narrative: Establishing Research Network and Food Safety Innovation Hub (RNFSIH) through  South-South and Triangular Cooperation
description_narrative: Creation and establishment of a Research Network and Food Safety Innovation Hub (RNFSIH) supports spearhead innovation programs in managing and harmonizing food safety and quality systems that meet local needs; develop innovative solutions and services at the national or regional level to strengthen food safety, and ultimately efficient value chain development and optimization of resource use; and support the capacity development of government institutions to ideate, develop and scale-up conducive strategies, policies, or programmes to mainstream innovation.
